QuestData.Title: Absorbent
QuestData.Description: One other thing I need. Hot water.$B$BNot easy around here. Not hot springs, no friends to share. One good way though. Have this sponge... it's ultra absorbent! Use it to go soak Vile Splashes at the sandbar eastish.$B$BWith enough, go squeeze them out over near the tower to summon jumbo elemental. He has hot water.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 20 Simmering Water Droplets from the Vile Splashes east of the Ruins of Arkkoran.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Azshari Sea Sponge undulates with living water.
QuestData.RewardText: You've collected all of the simmering water droplets that Ergll requested. Now it's just a matter of summoning the "jumbo" elemental.
